venue.name: Hale Brook Trail/ Mt Hale - Trailhead Parking

item.description:
Mts. Zealand & Hale... A two-fer!

At 8:45 am we meet at the Hale Brook trailhead. Here we will spot a car (or two) and then make the short drive to the Zealand Trail. We take the Zealand Trail past Zealand Pond and the Zealand Hut. We will stop at the Zealand Hut long enough to fill water if needed. From here we take the Twinway to the summit of Mt. Zealand.

We then backtrack to the Zealand Hut via the Twinway. We will take a short break at the hut to eat and rest. Departing the Zealand Hut we will take the Lend-A-Hand trail to the summit of Mt. Hale. From the summit of Mt. Hale we descend to our spotted cars via the Hale Brook Trail.

Event is cross posted with the Random Group.

Distance: 13.48 miles
Book time: 9 hrs
Elevation gain: 4080'

*******************************
IMPORTANT NOTES

Make sure you are prepared! It is sill winter in the mountains. Snowshoes and traction devices are a requirement!
item.name: Mts. Zealand & Hale... A two-fer!
